name: Sleepy Jackson
description:
Picklepeeve has released its second adventure game to have a whale of a time! We are so excited to share this game to everyone and  because we are growing and still learning developers, we would love to hear from you in the comments if you will encounter some bugs or errors in the game to help us make this game better. We thank you for your support for being part of our journey to improve and create more amazing games!

Our character Jackson love to slumber and has bewildered imaginations on his head, believing there are friendly monsters under his bed! Little did our Sleepy Jackson know that the monsters are not his friends, slowly crawling into the night and dragged him down into their world! Will this be a nightmare for Jackson, or an adventure to dream on?
